{{Infobox VG | title = Portugal 1111: A conquista de Soure | image = [[image:Portugal 1111.jpg|256px]] | composer = [[AmÃ­lcar Cardoso]]
[[JoÃ£o Redondo]] | released = {{Vgrelease|Portugal|April 22, 2004}} | developer = [[Ciberbit]] | publisher = [[Impresa|VisÃ£o Magazine]] | engine = | version = | genre = [[Real-time strategy]] | modes = [[Single-player video game|Single-player]] | ratings = [[InspecÃ§Ã£o Geral das Actividades Culturais|IGAC]]: M/6 (6+) | platforms = [[Microsoft Windows|PC]] | media = 1 [[Compact Disc|CD]] | input=[[Computer keyboard|Keyboard]], [[Computer mouse|mouse]] |}} '''''Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure''''' ("Portugal 1111: Soure's Conquest") is a [[real-time strategy]] game developed by [[Ciberbit]], a Portuguese multimedia company, in partnership with the [[Soure Municipality, Portugal|Municipality of Soure]] and historians from the [[University of Coimbra]]. The game depicts the historical events of the Portuguese ''[[Reconquista]]'', when the Christians fought against [[Moorish]] invaders. It was the first commercial video game completely produced and designed in Portugal.[http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111 Portugal 1111 for Windows - MobyGames] The game, a historic real-time strategy game similar to Microsoft's [[Age of Empires]], was published by the Portuguese magazine [[Impresa|VisÃ£o]], and was released in 2004. ==External links== *[http://www.portugal1111.com/ Official website] {{pt icon}} *[http://www.ciberbit.pt/multimedia/produto.aspx?pid=8 ''Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure'' at Ciberbit.pt] *[http://pc.ptgamers.com/analise.asp?id_analise=449 Review at PTGamers.com] {{pt icon}} *[http://www.gamerstek.com/readarticle-20.php Review at Gamerstek.com] {{pt icon}} *[http://www.gamespot.com/pc/strategy/portugal1111aconquistadesoure/index.html?tag=result;title;0 ''Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure''] at [[GameSpot]] *[http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/portugal-1111 ''Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure''] at [[MobyGames]] *[http://www.gamefaqs.com/pc/921971-portugal-1111-a-conquista-de-soure/data ''Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure''] at [[GameFAQs]] *[http://www.portugal1111.com/modules.php?op=modload&name=News&file=index&catid=&topic=3 Screenshots at the Official website] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:2004 video games]] [[Category:Europe-exclusive video games]] [[Category:Medieval video games]] [[Category:Real-time strategy video games]] [[Category:Video games developed in Portugal]] [[Category:Video games set in Portugal]] [[Category:Video games with historical settings]] [[Category:Video games with isometric graphics]] [[Category:Windows games]] {{Strategy-videogame-stub}} [[pt:Portugal 1111: A Conquista de Soure]]
